Scroll to Approvals widget
Click on Filter icon on the top right of approvals widget
Click dropdown on filter dropdown
Add a filter
Add a filter restriction( Add date )
Click Apply

Filter options are drop down
Filter is added
Filter restriction is typed in

b) Applies the filters and saves as the users default. Widget always loads with these filters when reloading or logging out/in.

Applies the filters as defined by standard widget filtering functionality

custom_expected: Shows additional information in a tool tip. Refer to data discovery and wireframe for details depending on each tool tip
